The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 January is 3,129,156 (5,559.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 17 January, there were 266,156 new confirmed cases (472.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 January, there were 335,069 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 21% (68,913 fewer cases).
